API Documentation

class EventTarget

package js.html

extended by AudioContext, AudioNode, Database, Request, Transaction, Animation, AudioTrackList, BatteryManager, FontFaceSet, MediaSource, MediaStream, MediaStreamTrack, Node, PermissionStatus, Screen, ScreenOrientation, SourceBuffer, SourceBufferList, SpeechSynthesisUtterance, TextTrack, TextTrackCue, TextTrackList, VideoTrackList, WebSocket, Window, XMLHttpRequestEventTarget

EventTarget is an interface implemented by objects that can receive events and may have listeners for them.

Documentation EventTarget by Mozilla Contributors, licensed under CC-BY-SA 2.5.

See:

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/EventTarget
